name: Memory Maze (itch) (MatejaG, JureV, notyateart)
description:
Imagine waking up at the hospital, not remembering anything, not knowing who you are. Some people visit you. They claim they’re your family. They bring meaningful objects to help you remember. You try, but your memory feels like a maze. Can you find the way out and remember your life again?

CONTROLS:
A - left
D - right

CREDITS:
~ Johannes Elias Lechner: Game Design, Story, Programming, Sound, Music
~ Jure Vertelj: Game Design, Story, 3D/2d art, Lighting & VFX, Optimization and Gameplay
~ Mateja Gerjevič: Game Design, Story, 3D art, layout design, dialogs, text, narration (sound), video editing (trailer)

ASSETS:
~ character's voices produced using: replicastudios.com
